blackHole:GetOverHere.NAME: Get Over Here
blackHole:GetOverHere.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and Pull Enemy Into Gravity Orb Range If Used On Boss Pulls Boss 100 Units Forward

blackHole:HarnessGravity.NAME: Harness Gravity
blackHole:HarnessGravity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! and Channel One Gravity Orb

blackHole:SolarWind.NAME: Solar Wind
blackHole:SolarWind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! To Target Enemy And !D! Damage To The Enemy Behind It As Well As Stunning It for !M! Turn

blackHole:Implosion.NAME: Implosion
blackHole:Implosion.DESCRIPTION: Pull Enemies !M! Then Evoke 1 Gravity Orb

blackHole:Dimensional_Rift.NAME: Dimensional Rift
blackHole:Dimensional_Rift.DESCRIPTION: If Enemy Is Within 350 Units Deal !D! + 15 Otherwise Deal !D! Damage

blackHole:Meteor_Strike.NAME: Meteor Strike
blackHole:Meteor_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage To All Enemies Twice If Enemies Are In Gravity Orb Range Deal !M! Damage

blackHole:Vacuum_Seal.NAME: Vacuum Seal
blackHole:Vacuum_Seal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage And Apply !M! Reduced Gravity To Enemy

blackHole:Eternium_Maw.NAME: Eternium Maw
blackHole:Eternium_Maw.DESCRIPTION: Pull All Enemies Into Engulf Range
